StrayPawBridge.summary: A pet adoption platform with listings, adoptions, and admin moderation.
StrayPawBridge.description: StrayPawBridge is a full-stack web app for managing rescued pet adoptions. It includes user accounts, adoption requests, admin moderation, and an intuitive dashboard for rescuers and adopters.

APIpalooza.summary: A festival of API integrations in Rails + Hotwire.
APIpalooza.description: APIpalooza is a playful project integrating multiple third-party APIs into a single Rails + Hotwire app, showcasing clean architecture, service objects, and interactive UI updates.

Dice Roller.summary: Hope & Fear dice roller for Daggerheart built with React & Framer.
Dice Roller.description: A sleek digital dice roller for the TTRPG Daggerheart, using React + Vite, animated with Framer Motion. Includes advantage/disadvantage mechanics and engaging visuals.

React Movies.summary: A React application to browse and discover movies and TV shows.
React Movies.description: React Movies is a feature-rich app for exploring films and TV series, complete with detailed pages, cast info, trailers, and responsive design. Built with the TMDB API and modern React patterns.

cezar-grid.summary: Single-page responsive portfolio website for Cezar Araujo.
cezar-grid.description: A professional single-page portfolio for Cezar Araujo, an Electrical Engineer. Features responsive grid layouts, project highlights, and a clean design tailored to his field.

To Do List.summary: A simple and modern Todo List built with React + Vite.
To Do List.description: A minimal yet stylish Todo List app showcasing clean React architecture, local storage persistence, and responsive design, built with Vite and Tailwind.
